HOMES.teleport.success.en-US: [grey]You have been teleported to your home [blue][home]</color>!</color>

HOMES.teleport.error.disabled.de-DE: [grey]Das Home [blue][home]</color> wurde automatisch oder von einem <red>Admin</red> <color:#ff0000>deaktiviert!</color></color>
HOMES.teleport.error.disabled.en-US: [grey]The home [blue][home]</color> has been disabled automatically or by an <red>Admin</red> <color:#ff0000>!</color></color>

HOMES.create.error.limit.de-DE: [grey]Du hast bereits das <yellow>Maximum an Homes</yellow> <dark_grey>([red][limit]</color> [grey]/</color> [green][max]</color>)</dark_grey> erreicht!</color>
HOMES.create.error.limit.en-US: [grey]You have already reached the [yellow]maximum limit of homes</color> <dark_grey>([[blue][limit]</color>)</dark_grey>!</color>

HOMES.view.self.error.de-DE: [grey]DU kannst deine [blue]eigenen Homes</color> nicht im [red]Admin-Modus</color> anschauen!</color>
HOMES.view.self.error.en-US: [grey]You can't view your [blue]own homes</color> in [red]Admin mode!</color></color>

HOMES.list.gui.item.delete.all.lore.de-DE:
[grey]Klicke um alle deine [blue]homes zu löschen.
[grey]Aufpassen: Dies kann NICHT rückgängig gemacht werden!

[grey]Click to delete all your [blue]homes.
[grey]Attention: This can NOT be undone!

HOMES.teleport.error.exist.de-DE: [grey]Das [blue]Home,</color> zu welchem du dich [blue]teleportieren</color> willst, existiert [red]nicht</color> mehr!</color>
HOMES.teleport.error.exist.en-US: [grey]The [blue]home</color> you want to [blue]teleport</color> to doesn't exist [red]anymore!</color></color>
